an3.105:1.1: “No cedam, bhikkhave, loke assado abhavissa, nayidam satta loke sarajjeyyum.
an3.105:1.2: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi loke assado, tasma satta loke sarajjanti.
an3.105:1.3: No cedam, bhikkhave, loke adinavo abhavissa, nayidam satta loke nibbindeyyum.
an3.105:1.4: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi loke adinavo, tasma satta loke nibbindanti.
an3.105:1.5: No cedam, bhikkhave, loke nissaranam abhavissa, nayidam satta lokamha nissareyyum.
an3.105:1.6: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi loke nissaranam, tasma satta lokamha nissaranti.
an3.105:1.7: Yavakivanca, bhikkhave, satta lokassa assadanca assadato adinavanca adinavato nissarananca nissaranato yathabhutam nabbhannasum, neva tava, bhikkhave, satta sadevaka loka samaraka sabrahmaka sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya nissata visamyutta vippamutta vimariyadikatena cetasa viharimsu.
an3.105:1.8: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, satta lokassa assadanca assadato adinavanca adinavato nissarananca nissaranato yathabhutam abbhannasum, atha, bhikkhave, satta sadevaka loka samaraka sabrahmaka sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya nissata visamyutta vippamutta vimariyadikatena cetasa viharanti”ti.
